title: Unable to signup for PBE
body: Been trying for an hour+ to register for a PBE account, but every time I press the Check My Eligibility button, I get "Something went wrong. Please refresh the page and try again." I'm honor 5, have never been banned, and have been playing this game religiously since I joined in 6.8 (the {{champion:44}} rework patch), so it shouldn't be an eligibility issue. I read that people had this problem earlier, and some had it resolved already; It's probably just a matter of waiting, considering how many people are registering right now, but I figured I should make a post in case anyone has any insight on how long that wait will be.

replies.body: Yeeeaaa that signup page got a wee bit flooded from all of the excitementy of PBE launching again. In case you missed it, there's a [**PBE Signups Sticky**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/fAy3y263-pbe-is-backwait-wut) up at the top of H&S talking about how the signups are still working, but some might need to wait until the traffic dies down a bit for it to work.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=zEGofAsB,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-13T00:23:38.678+0000)
>
> Yeeeaaa that signup page got a wee bit flooded from all of the excitementy of PBE launching again. In case you missed it, there's a [**PBE Signups Sticky**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/fAy3y263-pbe-is-backwait-wut) up at the top of H&S talking about how the signups are still working, but some might need to wait until the traffic dies down a bit for it to work.

Yeah, understandable lol. I'm sure tons of other people are super excited to try out runes reforged. Thank you for the reply :)
